# Keyboard Shortcuts Reference {#sec-appendix-shortcuts}

This appendix provides keyboard shortcuts for the command line, RStudio, and other tools used throughout this book.

## Bash/Terminal Shortcuts {#sec-bash-shortcuts}

### Navigation {#sec-bash-nav}

| Shortcut | Action |
|:---------|:-------|
| `Ctrl+A` | Move cursor to beginning of line |
| `Ctrl+E` | Move cursor to end of line |
| `Ctrl+B` | Move cursor back one character |
| `Ctrl+F` | Move cursor forward one character |
| `Alt+B` | Move cursor back one word |
| `Alt+F` | Move cursor forward one word |
| `Ctrl+XX` | Toggle between start of line and current position |

: Bash navigation shortcuts {#tbl-bash-nav}

### Editing {#sec-bash-edit}

| Shortcut | Action |
|:---------|:-------|
| `Ctrl+D` | Delete character under cursor (or logout if empty) |
| `Ctrl+H` | Delete character before cursor (backspace) |
| `Ctrl+W` | Delete word before cursor |
| `Alt+D` | Delete word after cursor |
| `Ctrl+K` | Delete from cursor to end of line |
| `Ctrl+U` | Delete from cursor to beginning of line |
| `Ctrl+Y` | Paste last deleted text (yank) |
| `Alt+Y` | Cycle through previously deleted text |
| `Ctrl+T` | Swap current character with previous |
| `Alt+T` | Swap current word with previous |
| `Alt+U` | Uppercase from cursor to end of word |
| `Alt+L` | Lowercase from cursor to end of word |
| `Alt+C` | Capitalize word |
| `Ctrl+_` | Undo last edit |

: Bash editing shortcuts {#tbl-bash-edit}

### History {#sec-bash-history}

| Shortcut | Action |
|:---------|:-------|
| `↑` or `Ctrl+P` | Previous command in history |
| `↓` or `Ctrl+N` | Next command in history |
| `Ctrl+R` | Reverse search through history |
| `Ctrl+S` | Forward search through history |
| `Ctrl+G` | Cancel history search |
| `Alt+.` | Insert last argument of previous command |
| `!!` | Repeat last command |
| `!$` | Last argument of last command |
| `!*` | All arguments of last command |
| `!n` | Execute command number n from history |
| `!string` | Execute most recent command starting with string |
| `!?string` | Execute most recent command containing string |
| `^old^new` | Replace old with new in last command |

: Bash history shortcuts {#tbl-bash-history}

### Process Control {#sec-bash-process}

| Shortcut | Action |
|:---------|:-------|
| `Ctrl+C` | Cancel/interrupt current command |
| `Ctrl+Z` | Suspend current process (move to background) |
| `Ctrl+D` | End of input / logout |
| `Ctrl+S` | Pause output (freeze screen) |
| `Ctrl+Q` | Resume output (unfreeze screen) |
| `Ctrl+L` | Clear screen (same as `clear`) |

: Bash process control {#tbl-bash-process}

### Completion {#sec-bash-completion}

| Shortcut | Action |
|:---------|:-------|
| `Tab` | Autocomplete command, filename, or variable |
| `Tab Tab` | Show all possible completions |
| `Alt+?` | Show possible completions |
| `Alt+*` | Insert all possible completions |

: Bash completion shortcuts {#tbl-bash-completion}

| `Ctrl+A "` | List windows |

| `Ctrl+A d` | Detach from session |
| `Ctrl+A k` | Kill current window |
| `Ctrl+A S` | Split horizontally |
| `Ctrl+A |` | Split vertically |
| `Ctrl+A Tab` | Switch between splits |
| `Ctrl+A X` | Close current split |
| `Ctrl+A [` | Enter copy mode |
| `Ctrl+A ]` | Paste |

## Vim/Vi Shortcuts {#sec-vim}

### Modes {#sec-vim-modes}

| Key | Action |
|:----|:-------|
| `i` | Enter insert mode (before cursor) |
| `a` | Enter insert mode (after cursor) |
| `I` | Insert at beginning of line |
| `A` | Insert at end of line |
| `o` | Open new line below |
| `O` | Open new line above |
| `v` | Visual mode (character) |
| `V` | Visual mode (line) |
| `Ctrl+V` | Visual mode (block) |
| `Esc` | Return to normal mode |
| `:` | Enter command mode |

: Vim modes {#tbl-vim-modes}

### Navigation {#sec-vim-nav}

| Key | Action |
|:----|:-------|
| `h j k l` | Left, down, up, right |
| `w` | Next word |
| `b` | Previous word |
| `e` | End of word |
| `0` | Beginning of line |
| `$` | End of line |
| `^` | First non-blank character |
| `gg` | Go to first line |
| `G` | Go to last line |
| `nG` | Go to line n |
| `Ctrl+F` | Page forward |
| `Ctrl+B` | Page backward |
| `Ctrl+D` | Half page down |
| `Ctrl+U` | Half page up |
| `%` | Jump to matching bracket |

: Vim navigation {#tbl-vim-nav}

### Editing {#sec-vim-edit}

| Key | Action |
|:----|:-------|
| `x` | Delete character |
| `dd` | Delete line |
| `dw` | Delete word |
| `d$` | Delete to end of line |
| `yy` | Copy (yank) line |
| `yw` | Copy word |
| `p` | Paste after cursor |
| `P` | Paste before cursor |
| `u` | Undo |
| `Ctrl+R` | Redo |
| `.` | Repeat last command |
| `r` | Replace character |
| `cw` | Change word |
| `cc` | Change line |
| `>>` | Indent line |
| `<<` | Unindent line |

: Vim editing {#tbl-vim-edit}

### Search and Replace {#sec-vim-search}

| Command | Action |
|:--------|:-------|
| `/pattern` | Search forward |
| `?pattern` | Search backward |
| `n` | Next match |
| `N` | Previous match |
| `*` | Search for word under cursor |
| `:%s/old/new/g` | Replace all in file |
| `:s/old/new/g` | Replace all in line |
| `:%s/old/new/gc` | Replace with confirmation |

: Vim search and replace {#tbl-vim-search}

### Saving and Quitting {#sec-vim-save}

| Command | Action |
|:--------|:-------|
| `:w` | Save |
| `:w filename` | Save as filename |
| `:q` | Quit |
| `:q!` | Quit without saving |
| `:wq` or `:x` | Save and quit |
| `ZZ` | Save and quit (normal mode) |
| `ZQ` | Quit without saving (normal mode) |

: Vim save and quit {#tbl-vim-save}

## RStudio Shortcuts {#sec-rstudio}

### Code Execution {#sec-rstudio-exec}

| Shortcut (Mac) | Shortcut (Windows/Linux) | Action |
|:---------------|:-------------------------|:-------|
| `Cmd+Enter` | `Ctrl+Enter` | Run current line/selection |
| `Cmd+Shift+Enter` | `Ctrl+Shift+Enter` | Run current chunk (Quarto/Rmd) |
| `Cmd+Shift+S` | `Ctrl+Shift+S` | Source entire script |
| `Cmd+Shift+P` | `Ctrl+Shift+P` | Run previous code again |
| `Cmd+Alt+R` | `Ctrl+Alt+R` | Run all code above |
| `Cmd+Alt+E` | `Ctrl+Alt+E` | Run from beginning to current line |

| `V` | Paste cell below |
| `Shift+V` | Paste cell above |

| `Y` | Change to code cell |
| `M` | Change to markdown cell |

| `Shift+↑` | Extend selection above |
| `Shift+↓` | Extend selection below |
| `Shift+M` | Merge selected cells |
| `L` | Toggle line numbers |
| `O` | Toggle output |
| `H` | Show keyboard shortcuts |
